sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Update conflict execution status to success for pre upgrade version reports</description> <name>NLU Conflict - Update status</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var tables = NLUWorkbenchConstants.tables; var executionGr = new GlideRecord(tables.NLU_CONFLICT_EXECUTION); executionGr.addNullQuery('status'); executionGr.setValue('status', 'success'); executionGr.updateMultiple(); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-07-19 11:28:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>82c827f7c7d93010c59db91703c260b6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>NLU Conflict - Update status</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features" source="sn_nlu_workbench">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_82c827f7c7d93010c59db91703c260b6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-07-21 08:14:27</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
